EmailTemplate.description: Partnership Dialogue Series School Registration Reminder Santa Ana 2008
EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series School Registration Reminder Santa Ana,CA - Feb 2008
EmailTemplate.subject: Courtesy Reminder - American Student Assistance Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is a friendly reminder of your registration for an American Student Assistance event
You've been registered for the Santa Ana Partnership Dialogue Series.
Date: February 22, 2008 Time: 8:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. Location: Embassy Suites, near John Wayne Airport Directions: http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/locations_western.cfm#10
Continental breakfast and lunch will be served.
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your training registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
Other Information All of ASA's training programs are offered free of charge. Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions about our training program.
In case of inclement weather, please call the number above to check for a delayed start or class cancellation. Updates will be done by 6:15am on the day of training.
